sub_title: Director Nordics, Southern Europe, Global accounts
summary:
With a background in Economics and a bachelor's degree in Communication Science from the University of Amsterdam, my career began in the Dutch public broadcasting sector with AVRO (now AVROTROS). I transitioned to Transparent, a fast-growing data mining firm, where I embraced the role of Sales Manager, overseeing the Benelux region and eventually rising to the position of Business Director.

During my tenure at Transparent, Benelux sales surged by more than a hundred percent. Seeking fresh challenges, I expanded into the Nordic market, establishing Transparent as a leading AP audit company in the region. Later, my focus expanded to Southern Europe, where I spearheaded our presence in Portugal and made inroads into the Spanish market. Today, I'm proud to have played a pivotal role in the company's growth and success across diverse markets.

profile_positions.description:
Transparent, an accounts-payable (AP) data mining company, provides financial services to private and public sectors worldwide. The company uses RSA secured data mining tools to create value and insight in AP data. This helps companies to: identify, verify and recover overpayments, open credits and missed discounts. AP can become a profit centre and companies that focus on long-term innovative solutions will be able to realize improvements and create efficiencies. The results of the data mining process and an overview of the clients management information can be viewed through the Transparent Portal. This Portal is also used as a starting point for Supplier Optimizing, Supplier Financing (reversed factoring) and Continuous Monitoring which is a unique tool that prevents overpayments before they occur. 
The company was founded in 2000 and headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, with branch offices in Europe, the United States of America, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia and India.
profile_positions.title: Business Director, Nordics, Benelux & Southern Europe

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for existing clients and new business development. Many clients are multinational companies with global activities. We provide financial services for about half the AEX index companies but also for many medium-sized companies, non-profit organizations and government institutions.

Founded in 2000, Transparent is an international financial services provider specializing in data mining of Accounts Payable data. The company has rapidly grown into a global operation, with operations in the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, India, France, the United Kingdom, Italy and the United States of America.
Our services include the analysis of outgoing payments and associated processes with the aim to convert payment data into detailed management information. Alongside the analysis, we identify, verify and collect undue payments on a no-recovery no-fee basis. Our analysis is robust, fast, risk-free, and doesn’t consume our clients’ resources, due to our excellent technology deployment and fully-industrialized process. The results are presented in an easy-to-read dashboard and used by Transparent to provide clients with management information and sensible improvement recommendations regarding their accounts-payable processes.

www.transparent.eu
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager, Benelux
